svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Bucket Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

important.para: It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 97 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side bucket seat (Item 2) inside cab.

Position passenger side bucket seat (Item 2) in place over threaded mounting studs in cab floor and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 1). Tighten to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20.5 to 27 N•m). If so equipped, connect air line (Item 3) to passenger bucket seat at the quick disconnect connector (Item 4).

Position outer seat belt (Item 6, view arrow B) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 7, view arrow B) and install hex flanged bolt (Item 5, view arrow B). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).

Position inner seat belt (Item 9, view arrow A) onto seat belt mounting bracket (Item 10, view arrow A) and install hex flanged bolt (Item 8, view arrow A). Tighten to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 40.7 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install driver side bucket seat.

svcsubproc.title: Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para: Place fixed passenger seat (Item 3) inside cab.

Position fixed passenger seat (Item 3) in place over threaded mounting studs (Item 2) in floor mat (Item 6) and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 1). Tighten to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20.5 to 27 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install fixed driver seat.

svcsubproc.title: Install Two Man Fixed Bench Seat without Tool Box on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

important.para: It is recommended that when installing seats back into a vehicle, that all new mounting hardware be used to ensure that the proper torquing requirements can be met.

step1.para: Place two man fixed bench seat without tool box (Item 4) inside cab.

Position two man fixed bench seat without tool box (Item 4) in place over threaded mounting studs (Item 2) in floor mat (Item 6) and install four hex nuts and washers (Item 1). Tighten to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20.5 to 27 N•m).
Push seat belts through from back side of seat between upper and lower seat of two man fixed bench seat without tool box (Item 4) and pull them all the way through from the front side of the seat.
